warden

Doing all kinds of fun stuff with blockchains.

## Highlights

  * yAcademy Guest Speaker

  * Identified critical risk in Aera codebase

Identified a critical bug stemming from another auditor's finding due to
Aera's dependency on Balancer.

  * Successfully disclosed an exploitable scenario on Balancer via Immunefi.

On May 14th 2022, I worked alongside another auditor to disclose an exploit to
Balancer via Immunefi, receiving $50k as a reward. No user funds were lost as
a result.
